description: This file defines a React functional component named PreviewPage that renders a full-window preview of generated HTML content. It uses React hooks such as useEffect and useMemo, and interacts with external state via useChatState. The component sanitizes the HTML before rendering it inside an iframe or displays a message if there's no content.
